name: htmlEditFormat
description: Replaces special characters in a string with their HTML-escaped equivalents.

params.name: string
params.description: A string or a variable that contains one.

params.name: version
params.description: HTML version to use; currently ignored.

coldfusion.notes: Use encodeForHTML, which can provide more protection from XSS.

examples.title: Escapes the HTML characters
examples.code: htmlEditFormat( "This is a test & this is another <This text is in angle brackets> Previous line was blank!!!" )
examples.result: This is a test & this is another <This text is in angle brackets> Previous line was blank!!!
